description:

Easier than Lutris
Client of the game is normal. You can login, join a lobby, pick your champ but than it won't load the game and you get leaveban.... Enjoy
System error after champ select

This is the best way to install League on Linux. It is the only way of installing it which has given me sound in game, even if then I lost the in game sound after the first game.


Install as such: 
sudo apt install snapd
sudo snap install leagueoflegends --edge --devmode
snap refresh --candidate wine-platform-runtime
snap refresh --candidate wine-platform-4-staging
summary: Not as many issues as people say!

description: Works from the first try, just not to forget to update the wine platform with proper commands.

its not perfect but it runs, usually after 2-3 app start full experience

sudo apt install snapd
sudo snap install leagueoflegends --edge --devmode
snap refresh --candidate wine-platform-runtime
snap refresh --candidate wine-platform-4-staging

description: cannot move camera in game

There are a few tricks in WINE that can make the game work so much better and can boost FPS that are not implimented. As a result, I'm only getting around 90 FPS (highest settings) in lane during normal gameplay even though I have a Core i7 and an RTX 2080.

Other than that it's not bad.
You can play LOL without any hassle. A great snap.

description: Worked perfectly for me

Install wine and winetricks first, set WINEARCH to win32. When you get to a login screen for the first time, let it patch and then exit; don't log in. Whenever launching the program, don't click or do other things. Give it a full 5 minutes to launch without interruption before deciding that it doesn't work.
summary: Didn't work on the first try, but it worked

Cuando intento iniciar una partida, salta una ventana de alerta del sistema donde expresa que "No fue posible iniciar el dispositivo de video"; por lo tanto el juego no ingresa a la partida. 

Cuando instale el juego en la version --edge si dejo jugar e inicar partidas sin novedad. Pero al actualizarlo al --beta salto ese programa.

Espero sus comentarios!. Gracias

Was able to start and play the game with friends without encountering any issues except screen scrolling not working after tabbing out. Setting the game to borderless fixed this.
esta aplicación es benigna
Funciona relativamente bien a veces se cae cuando inicia el contador de partida y dentro del juego se optimiza relativamente bien pero aun asi deja que deseear

La manera más sencilla de poder instalar el LOL en ubuntu, sin largos procedimientos ni tutoriales extraños, simplemente instalas un snap y a correr.
No he tenido ningun problema con esta aplicación salvo que viene en ingles y no he encontrado la forma de cambiar el idioma y que tarda en arrancar bastante tiempo aun estando instalado en un ssd bastante rapido.
Súper recomendable para los que no se quieren comer la cabeza para jugar al LOL en ubuntu.
summary: Una alternativa la mar de buena

Mostly(99%) it's works fine for me on Ubuntu 19.10.
If I get some glitches, I have the way to fix them in no time.
By the way, there are few glitches u should know, they have happened with me:
1) sometimes, camera don't move with mouse move to the board of the screen - can be solved by - fast Shift-Tab switches.
2) sometimes, fps getting lower to 15 and you lose control on the charachter, even on gamemenu - can be solved by changing screenmode.

Anyway, I got extremely positive about how this game works on Linux.
So if u like LOL - u can use this emulation for sure.

На винде было под 150-200 фпс, тут как не меняй (разришене экрана, качкество графики, сглаживаение) 30-35 (ограничений нет) (темпиратора что процессора, что видеочипа около 60 градусов(макс 67 было)). Пинг тот же. Жутко логает клиент. А так в принципе терпимо. Совет: играйте за танков или что-то не очень резкое, и бед у вас не будет. А если вы хотите начать играть, то лучше не надо, пж, найдите дела по важнее и интрестние чем лига
